Or to a town near you, if you live in the United States.
 
 Iraqi refugees.
 
 This is always the fallout of any military incursion our nation undertakes onto foreign soil.
 
 We now have tens of thousands, if not hundreds of thousands of Vietnamese now residing in our country as a result of our Vietnamese adventure.
 
 We can expect no less from our Iraqi adventure.
 
 Also, Bush now wants to go into Iran on a little military exercise. I can hardly wait for the Iranian refugees to start knocking at our nation's doors.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Coming to Your Town Soon
